entities.description: The victim was the spouse of the perpetrator.
The victim was the common-law spouse of the perpetrator.
The victim was the parent of the perpetrator.
The victim was the sibling of the perpetrator.
The victim was the child of the perpetrator.
The victim was the grandparent of the perpetrator.

The victim was the stepparent of the perpetrator.
The victim was the stepchild of the perpetrator.

The victim was the offender themselves.
The victim was an acquaintance of the perpetrator.
The victim was a friend of the perpetrator.
The victim was the neighbor of the perpetrator.
The victim was the baby being taken care of by the perpetrator.
The victim was the boyfriend or girlfriend of the perpetrator.
The victim was the child of the perpetrator's boyfriend or girlfriend.
The victim was in a homosexual relationship with the perpetrator.
The victim was the ex-spouse of the perpetrator.
The victim was the employee of the perpetrator.
The victim was the employer of the perpetrator.
The victim was otherwise known to the perpetrator.
The victim was a stranger to the perpetrator.
The victim was an ex-relationship (ex-boyfriend or ex-girlfriend) of the perpetrator.
